title: notocactus

content: I need another loan$1,000 USDTPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $1,100Receiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will send in DMWho can make this deal, please leave your message here first, then we will make agreement and execute it after that.Thanks.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on November 10, 2022, 02:51:50 PMLoan repayment was sent. Please confirm it then I will lock this thread.Thank you.I have received the loan repayment in full with interest on time. Thanks for the repayment on time as well as for regular/good communication. Don't hesitate to let me know if you need any more help at any time if you need, thanks once again for your co-operation.
